schema.name: Schedule_arm
schema.description:
$Id: arm.exp,v 1.4 2005/05/13 18:19:32 abhpf Exp $ ISO TC184/SC4/WG12 N3743 - ISO/WD 10303-1437 Schedule - EXPRESS ARM
Abf hand edited to bring in type extensions from connector arm *
